task1.description: Adjustable office chair with lumbar support, breathable mesh back, and adjustable armrests.
High-speed laser printer, duplex printing, wireless connectivity, suitable for high-volume printing.
Secure and automated cloud backup service for business data, scalable storage, and 24/7 support.

task2.article_title: 5 Office Supply Trends to Watch in 2024
task2.summary: This Quill.com blog post highlights five key trends in office supplies for 2024: sustainability, technology integration, ergonomics, hybrid work support, and personalized solutions. It emphasizes the growing demand for eco-friendly products, smart office tech, comfortable and adaptable furniture, supplies for remote workers, and customized purchasing experiences.

task2.article_title: Top Cybersecurity Trends In IT Services For 2024
task2.summary: This Forbes article from December 2023, discusses top cybersecurity trends for IT services in 2024. It focuses on AI and machine learning in cybersecurity, the importance of proactive threat hunting, the need for robust cloud security measures, the increasing sophistication of ransomware attacks, and the critical role of cybersecurity skills development and training.
